english.segment1: When you wish upon a star. Your dreams will take you very far. But, when you wish upon a dream. Life ain't always what it seems, oh yeah. What'd you see in night so clear. In the sky so very dear
english.segment2: You're a shining star. No matter who you are. Shining bright to see. What you could truly be
english.segment3: Shining star come in to view. Shine its watchful light on you. Gives you strength to carry on. Makes your body big and strong oh yeah
english.segment4: So, if you find yourself in need. Why don't you listen to these words of heed. Be a child that's free of sin. Words of wisdom. Yes I can
english.segment5: You're a shining star. No matter who you are. Shining bright to see. What you could truly be
english.segment6: Shining star for you to see. What your life could truly be. Shining star for you to see. What your life could truly be
